columns.EMP_NUM: The unique identifier of each employee.
columns.EMP_LNAME: The last name of the employee.
columns.EMP_FNAME: The first name of the employee.
columns.EMP_INITIAL: The middle initial of the employee.
columns.EMP_JOBCODE: The job code indicating the employee's position.
columns.EMP_HIREDATE: The date when the employee was hired.
columns.EMP_DOB: The birth date of the employee.

EMPLOYEE.table_description: The table details employees and their personal information.

columns.CRS_CODE: The unique identifier for each course.
columns.DEPT_CODE: The code representing the department offering the course.
columns.CRS_DESCRIPTION: The title or description of the course.
columns.CRS_CREDIT: The number of credits awarded for completing the course.

COURSE.table_description: The table details courses offered in the college.

columns.CLASS_CODE: The unique identifier for each class.
columns.CRS_CODE: The code identifying the course associated with the class.
columns.CLASS_SECTION: The section number for the class.
columns.CLASS_TIME: The scheduled time for the class meetings.
columns.CLASS_ROOM: The room where the class is held.
columns.PROF_NUM: The identifier for the professor teaching the class.

CLASS.table_description: The table details class schedules and assignments in the college.

columns.EMP_NUM: The unique identifier of each professor.
columns.DEPT_CODE: The code representing the department of the professor.
columns.PROF_OFFICE: The office location of the professor.
columns.PROF_EXTENSION: The phone extension for contacting the professor.
columns.PROF_HIGH_DEGREE: The highest academic degree attained by the professor.

PROFESSOR.table_description: The table details professors and their departmental affiliations.

columns.STU_NUM: The unique identifier of each student.
columns.STU_LNAME: The last name of the student.
columns.STU_FNAME: The first name of the student.
columns.STU_INIT: The middle initial of the student.
columns.STU_DOB: The birth date of the student.
columns.STU_HRS: The total credit hours completed by the student.
columns.STU_CLASS: The classification of the student (e.g., Fr, So, Jr, Sr).
columns.STU_GPA: The current grade point average of the student.
columns.STU_TRANSFER: Indicators if the student is a transfer student.
columns.DEPT_CODE: The code corresponding to the student's enrolled department.
columns.STU_PHONE: The phone number extension of the student.
columns.PROF_NUM: The identifier for the professor assigned to the student.

STUDENT.table_description: The table details students and their academic information.

columns.DEPT_CODE: The unique identifier for each department.
columns.EMP_NUM: The identifier for the employee managing the department.
columns.SCHOOL_CODE: The code representing the school to which the department belongs.
columns.DEPT_ADDRESS: The physical address of the department.
columns.DEPT_EXTENSION: The phone extension for contacting the department.

DEPARTMENT.table_description: The table details departments and their associated information.

columns.CLASS_CODE: The unique identifier for the class in which the student is enrolled.
columns.STU_NUM: The unique identifier of the student enrolled in the class.
columns.ENROLL_GRADE: The grade awarded to the student for the class.

ENROLL.table_description: The table details the enrollment records of students in classes.
